verbs.description: [ARG1: islanders] [V: fall] [ARG2: 4 - 1] [ARGM-LOC: on west coast trip against sharks] the sharks outscored buffalo and new york 9 - 2 in winning both games at home after starting the season with just two wins in the first six games sharks islanders brock nelson joonas donskoi san jose new york islanders robin lehner san jose california brent burns logan couture timo meier sharks band formed 2007
